languages.text: "Как насчет обсудить планы Святой Инквизиции в Просторе Коронус? Легкая, ни к чему не обязывающая беседа".

traits.locale_text: "Как насчет обсудить планы Святой Инквизиции в Просторе Коронус? Легкая, ни к чему не обязывающая беседа".

languages.text: "Why don't we discuss the Holy Inquisition's plans in the Koronus Expanse? That is a light, undemanding topic."
languages.original_text: "Как насчет обсудить планы Святой Инквизиции в Просторе Коронус? Легкая, ни к чему не обязывающая беседа".

traits.locale_text: "Why don't we discuss the Holy Inquisition's plans in the Koronus Expanse? That is a light, undemanding topic."
"Why don't we discuss the Holy Inquisition's plans in the Koronus Expanse? That is a light, undemanding topic."
"Why don't we discuss the Holy Inquisition's plans in the Koronus Expanse? That is a light, undemanding topic."
"Why don't we discuss the Holy Inquisition's plans in the Koronus Expanse? That is a light, undemanding topic."

languages.text: “不如咱们来谈谈，审判庭在科罗努斯扩区有什么计划吧？这应该是个很轻松的话题。”
languages.original_text: "Why don't we discuss the Holy Inquisition's plans in the Koronus Expanse? That is a light, undemanding topic."

traits.locale_text: “不如咱们来谈谈，审判庭在科罗努斯扩区有什么计划吧？这应该是个很轻松的话题。”

languages.text: «¿Y si hablamos de los planes de la Santa Inquisición en la Extensión de Koronus? Es un tema ligero y poco exigente».
languages.original_text: "Why don't we discuss the Holy Inquisition's plans in the Koronus Expanse? That is a light, undemanding topic."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y si hablamos de los planes de la Santa Inquisición en la Extensión de Koronus? Es un tema ligero y poco exigente».

languages.text: 「コロヌス・エクスパンスにおける異端審問庁の計画について話し合わないか？深く考えなくていい、軽い話題だろ？」
languages.original_text: "Why don't we discuss the Holy Inquisition's plans in the Koronus Expanse? That is a light, undemanding topic."

traits.locale_text: 「コロヌス・エクスパンスにおける異端審問庁の計画について話し合わないか？深く考えなくていい、軽い話題だろ？」

languages.text: « Pourquoi ne parlerions-nous pas des plans de la Sainte Inquisition dans les Étendues de Koronus ? Un sujet on ne peut plus léger et pas du tout exigeant. »
languages.original_text: "Why don't we discuss the Holy Inquisition's plans in the Koronus Expanse? That is a light, undemanding topic."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi ne parlerions-nous pas des plans de la Sainte Inquisition dans les Étendues de Koronus ? Un sujet on ne peut plus léger et pas du tout exigeant. »

languages.text: "Warum sprechen wir nicht über die Pläne der Heiligen Inquisition in der Koronus-Ausdehnung? Das ist ein leichtes und wenig anspruchsvolles Thema."
languages.original_text: "Why don't we discuss the Holy Inquisition's plans in the Koronus Expanse? That is a light, undemanding topic."

traits.locale_text: "Warum sprechen wir nicht über die Pläne der Heiligen Inquisition in der Koronus-Ausdehnung? Das ist ein leichtes und wenig anspruchsvolles Thema."

languages.text: "Neden Kutsal Engizisyon'un Koronus Enginliği'ndeki planlarını tartışmıyoruz? Oldukça hafif ve zahmetsiz bir konu hem."
languages.original_text: "Why don't we discuss the Holy Inquisition's plans in the Koronus Expanse? That is a light, undemanding topic."
